title: Can't phase out coal power until storage, tech viable: Power Ministry
description: In its view sent around the beginning of United Nations' annual climate change conference to the ministry of environment, forest and climate change, which is leading the discussions at COP28 in Dubai, the power ministry cleared its stance on coal power, stating that until storage and abatement technologies become a viable option, phasing out of the fuel cannot be agreed to.
